description:
Rinne is suspected of stealing money at his own school! On the hunt to find the actual perpetrator, he discovers how little faith his friends have in him and his poverty.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Black Square Thing / Shortcut Through the Alley
Le rectangle noir / Le raccourci par la ruelle
Shikakukute Kuroi Yatsu / Roji no Chikamichi
四角くて黒いやつ / 路地の近道
